page.title: 05HOLTON:ATTITUDES.LANDSCAPE
page.content: Most people in Holton would like to see the village stay small.Various schemes have been suggested to make the area one of growth but as there is no industry and farming employs fewer people there would be little demand for housing.Holton was the centre of a community of pacifists during the war and some of the older people here were part of that community and are still farming here.It is sad to see the disappearance of the hedgerows to make way for larger fields but trees are being planted as copses.The young children go to Wragby school by bus. Older children cycle to school at Market Rasen.The free bus to the supermarket is well patronised so is the weekly shopping bus to Lincoln, although every household but 3 has at least 1 car.
